basics.name: Riyan Darmawan
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: As a passionate and results-driven full-stack developer, I've leveraged my one year of experience to craft dynamic and responsive web applications from concept to deployment. I'm proficient across the full stack, with a strong command of modern technologies like React, Next.js, Laravel, and NestJs, complemented by expertise in various databases including PostgreSQL and MongoDB. My time as a web developer intern at PT. Pratama Solusi Teknologi allowed me to hone my skills by creating a user-friendly company profile website, significantly boosting brand visibility. A continuous learner by nature, I am dedicated to solving real-world problems and optimizing code for efficiency and performance, and I'm excited to bring my technical skills and problem-solving mindset to contribute to innovative projects.

Integrated mobile-first responsive design principles, ensuring optimal functionality across devices and increasing mobile usability.
